name: Legacy of Flan 2: Flans Online
storyline:
The Flan Legacy continues...

Rumors of the sinister virus flan continue to spread to the corners of the land, stories of an infected flan that is trying to start a war against the flan community.

meanwhile, in the flan village, many flan are beginning to realize that the only way to confront this new threat is to join forces and travel the land together.

The virus flan lies deep in the south, hidden away in a shrine built in his own name and full of his own menacing flan henchmen.

The adventure begins...
summary: Legacy of Flan 2: Flans Online is the second title is the Legacy of Flan series. Created by Scott Cawthon in 2003.
